body:
Have we announced this plan publicly? I think removing it without
prior notice will break a lot of //go:generate lines.

I propose that we make a copy of cmd/yacc to x/tools/cmd/goyacc
at the start of the Go 1.7 freeze, but we release cmd/yacc one more
time in Go 1.7 and call out in the release docs that Go 1.7 is the last
release containing `go tool yacc` and prompt users to switch to
x/tools/cmd/goyacc.
